attributes.action: Increase the sentences of EVIL Kimberly Harte, 23 and Samuel Duncan, 27 for the torturing of their disabled child to LIFE IMPRISONMENT!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kimberly Harte was sentenced to 10½ years and Samuel Duncan was given 11½ years at Middlesex Crown Court. 

The 4 year old girl had boiling water poured over her hands, had huge clumps of hair ripped from her head, was kicked so hard in the groin she suffered internal injuries and was locked naked in the toilet each night. 

She was also forced to eat her own faeces.

The girl who now cannot walk and is scarred for life!

These EVIL ANIMALS will be out enjoying their life by the ages of 33 and 37 and deserve only life imprisonment!!!!!!!!!

Help by signing this petition and making sure that justice is served and that these animals rot in HELL!!!

Thank You!
